text: IBV may refer to: *Institute for Business Value, a unit of Innovation and Research wing of IBM Business Consulting. *Infectious bronchitis virus, the cause of avian infectious bronchitis, an important poultry disease. *ÍBV Vestmannaeyjar, an Icelandic football club *Instituto de Biomecánica de Valencia, Valencia Institute of Biomechanics (Spain) * Internationale Bibelforscher-Vereinigung, German Jehovah's Witnesses's association, suppressed by the Nazis
title: IBV
